r.s: Abstract base class for HTML classes (PHP5 port of HTML_Common package).
r.d: The HTML_Common2 package provides methods for HTML code display and attributes handling. * Methods to set, remove, update html attributes. * Handles comments in HTML code. * Handles global document options (encoding, linebreak and indentation characters). * Handles indentation for nicer HTML code.
r.n: First release of a new major version.
